name: pho
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of soup from Vietnam, usually containing noodles (= long, thin strips made from flour, water, and often egg), and small pieces of meat: Most of the customers were eating steaming bowls of pho. The key to good pho is the broth.
Максим Крысанов/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesI had a steaming, spicy bowl of pho for breakfast.The food was outstanding - the pho was delicious - and the service was great.Pho (noodle soup) is a quintessential Vietnamese dish.We ate Vietnamese food - things like shrimp curry and pho, Vietnamese soup.
